TunableEnum.name: FAN_SITUATION_TAG
TunableEnum.description: Tag which delineates which situations are fan situations.

TunableEnum.name: FAN_TARGETTING_TAG
TunableEnum.description: Tag applied to celebrities that can be targeted by fans. Used in conjunction with autonomy modifiers so we can consider celebrities without caring about whether or not they are on or off lot.

Tunable.name: FANNABLE_CELEBRITY_SITUATION
Tunable.description: Situation that will store all celebrity Sims that can be used to spawn fan or stan situations.

TunableList.name: STAN_DISABLING_BITS
TunableList.description: Rel bits, which if any are found on the stan, prevents the stan from kicking off their situation. Used to prevent a stan from being too stanny.

Tunable.name: STAN_FILTER
Tunable.description: Filter used to find the stan for a given Sim. This should only contain the minimum required filter terms for a Stan.

Tunable.name: STAN_PERK
Tunable.description: Perk used to determine if a Sim is stannable.
